1 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials skill level easy + abbreviations slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet materials ★ crochet hook 1 5mm should be taken number less than recommended for your yarn crochet should be tightly so that the granny squares was the form ★ i used aunt lydia s classic crochet size 10 350yds/320m 2 8 oz/ 80g you can use any yarn recommended for doily or lace you will need a small amount of yarn 5 10m/yds 2 contrasting colors to your taste scraps of suitable yarn can be used ★ starch or school glue or pva glue for stiffening your crochet motifs ★ metal rings and clasps for earrings and pliers there are many ways you can stiffen you crochet motifs and you can also use the stiffen agents to shape your crochet motifs liquid starch wash and dry your item put liquid starch buy in your local grocery store in a spray bottle lay your crochet motif flat and spray the starch onto it you can use school glue or pva glue mixed with water mix them in equal proportions dip your crochet motif in it and let it dry gauge app 33 sts = 10cm/4inch finished size if you are using recommended or other suitable yarn then the approximate dimensions for small granny squares 2×2cm / 0 8×0 8inches big squares 3×3cm / 1 2×1 2inches the size of squares will depend on the yarn and hook you choose -
